FuncDef:
The isis purge-source-trace block command disables IS-IS purge LSP source tracing on an interface.
The undo isis purge-source-trace block command enables IS-IS purge LSP source tracing on an interface. The isis purge-source-trace block command disables IS-IS purge LSP source tracing on an interface. The undo isis purge-source-trace block command enables IS-IS purge LSP source tracing on an interface. By default, IS-IS purge LSP source tracing on an interface is enabled on all interfaces.
